name: Kaboomy!
description:
JOIN THE CIRCUS, BECOME A DAREDEVIL!

Kaboomy! is an arcade game set in a wacky, cartoon circus.

Fire your daredevil from cannon to cannon, dodging pies, collecting coins and defying the gruesome grasp of gravity!

Throw your coins in the ringmasters hat to win one of over 30 different crazy costumes!

How to Play:

Click to fire a cannon.

Stay in the cannon for too long and it'll fire itself.

Move from cannon to cannon to score points.

If you hit a pie or the red net, it's game over!

Collect the coins that appear and toss them into the Ringmaster hat to unlock costumes!

The costumes you get are random, if you get a costume you already own you'll get a 'scrap'.

Collect 4 scraps to buy a costume you don't own.

Known Issues:

  • You can't double click the costume carousel in the gacha screen so to move it you have to click methodically.
  • Sometimes you pick up two coins at once.
  • Graphical issues when switching between the main menu and the gacha screen.
